item.title: Hardfork Update
item.dc:creator: ghost
item.description:
The Ghost team has officially completed the emergency hardfork on Friday, March 5th, that has temporarily disabled RingCT and CT transactions to fix the potential vulnerability from our parent code Particl. For weeks now, the Ghost team has thoroughly investigated and scanned the outstanding coin supply. Public outputs and anon transfers have also been monitored around the clock. […]

The post Hardfork Update appeared first on Ghost Veterans.

item.title: Emergency Hardfork
item.dc:creator: ghost
item.description:
“For the security of the network, your privacy and your ghost coins, please do not send transactions until this emergency is declared over.” The GHOST team has found a critical issue in the RingCT and CT code which requires a hardfork Saturday, March 6th, at 1:00am GMT. Please update your Ghost Desktop Wallet and Nodes […]

The post Emergency Hardfork appeared first on Ghost Veterans.

item.title: Community Update
item.dc:creator: ghost
item.description:
The New GHOST Team has been working very diligently this last month to fulfill the original mission we all fight for. We want to thank the entire community for helping GHOST reach it’s true potential. Much respect to everyone that has sacrificed their time for our common goal. Dandelion++ Protocol GHOST has worked very hard […]

The post Community Update appeared first on Ghost Veterans.

item.title: Ghost Update
item.dc:creator: ghost
item.description:
At block height 139456, Friday January 8th, 1:00-2:00 AM UTC, GHOST will be undergoing both a Core & Desktop Update. Everyone running client version 2.0.7 will need to update to 2.0.8, so you will be able to continue communicating with the blockchain. 2.0.8 resolves several issues with the OSX desktop. It is now properly signed […]

The post Ghost Update appeared first on Ghost Veterans.

item.title: Community Update
item.dc:creator: ghost
item.description:
Dec. 12th – Dec. 26th Ghost Core Update Ghost will be having a Core Update in January, containing several required updates for the longevity of Ghost. More information regarding exact details will be released very soon. Ghost Desktop Wallet $1,500.00 has been allocated from the development fund to fix several operating issues within the desktop […]

The post Community Update appeared first on Ghost Veterans.

item.title: Ghost Update 11/14

item.description:
Highlights: Starting today, Ghost Community updates will go out every second week on Saturday 14,754,945 $GHOST coins in circulation as of November 14, 2020 Ghost Veteran Rewards: The monthly Ghost Veteran block reward payment was distributed for the month of October 554 Ghost Veterans split 129,000 $GHOST coins averaging about 233 $GHOST per Veteran Ghost […]

item.title: Weekly Update
item.dc:creator: ghost
item.description:
Ghost Community Update 10/23-10/30 Ghost will now have updates every Friday posted on Ghost Veterans, Twitter, Telegram, and Discord. Developers are being considered for GhostDai development. Ghost Website Updates: The staking calculator has been accurately updated on Ghostbyjohnmcafee.com. It now calculates based upon the correct number of veterans and is updated monthly. It also calculates […]

The post Weekly Update appeared first on Ghost Veterans.
